headline: How Shifting Analyst Expectations Are Reshaping the Story Behind Fortinet’s Valuation
summary: Fortinet's narrative is shifting as analysts hold their fair value estimate steady near $87.45 per share while nudging the discount rate higher from about 8.45% to 8.48%. This signals slightly greater perceived risk without changing the long term intrinsic outlook. With revenue growth expectations essentially unchanged around 13.0%, the story now tilts toward how sentiment and risk assessments are evolving rather than any dramatic reset in fundamentals. Stay tuned to see how you can track...
